message: What can I use to manage states chages in my models?
Yes! It's pretty much what I'm looking for but not exactly. I was wondering if there is something like RoR Acts as State Machine. Anybody know it?
What's the  difference? AASM is too bound to Ruby syntax, django-fms is the same, but for python style
another thumbs up for django-fsm - used it recently after quite a bit of looking for alternative solutions, and it fitted my (limited) understanding of states best.
The 'docutils' package has a clean and well-documented FSM module at its core.  Not sure how easy it would be to use in other random projects though.
